existing_features.title: Update only the catalog item price that renders in the selected element at XPath `/html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/div[1]/div[4]/div[1]/div[1]/span[1]` so that it displays as AED 4 (i.e., the backend `price` value for that specific item must be `4`).

new_feature_requests.summary: Update the relevant price/value to AED 4

projectName: Update the selected catalog price to AED 4
